snippet.title: Yoda Soccer Project
snippet.description: Yoda Soccer is a new soccer game which intends to give a continuation to the funny and easy playable series of Sensible World of Soccer (aka SWOS). Yoda soccer is written in BlitzMax. The source code is available under the GNU General Public License.

snippet.title: The RoboCup Soccer Simulator
snippet.description: The RoboCup Soccer Simulator is a research and educational tool for multi-agent systems and artificial intelligence. It enables for two teams of 11 simulated autonomous robotic players to play soccer (football).

snippet.title: FantasySoccerManager
snippet.description: FantasySoccerManager is a soccer management game

snippet.title: Bygfoot Football Manager
snippet.description: A small and simple graphical football (a.k.a. soccer) manager game featuring many international leagues and cups. In newer versions you can even try to become World Champion 2006 or European Champion 2008!

snippet.title: RoboViz
snippet.description: An advanced monitor and visualization tool for the 3D simulation soccer league of RoboCup.

snippet.title: FCPortugalSPlanner
snippet.description: Graphical tool to specify "Setplays" to use with Setplay Library

snippet.title: XWord
snippet.description: XWord is a crossword puzzle program designed to be highly configurable. It supports a variety of formats: puz, xpf, jpz, and ipuz. Includes support for rebus puzzles, "trick" puzzles, diagramless puzzles, scrambled/locked puzzles, and a timer.
